trouble.label: Debug mode does not work correctly. No display in Variables View

problem.label: Your version of Eclipse is not compliant with your version of ADT

solution.label: Check if all required libs are installed

problem.label: Problem to find lib called antlr

trouble.label: During export of ATL sources, there are errors (e.g. The import org.atl.engine cannot be resolved)
ATL is well installed. I try to execute my transformation but it does not work

problem.label: Maybe there is a problem with the launch configuration

trouble.label: Problem during execution or compilation referencing package org.eclipse.emf.*

solution.label: Check if your EMF version is compatible with your Eclipse version

trouble.label: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError If plugins do not do what they are supposed to do If plugins are not visible even they are installed
